ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] New patch message
ygData.msgSnippet: But remember as Abashi said, and he writes these things now supposedly, there are several Verant people who have high level bards that he consults regularly
ygData.messageBody:
But remember as Abashi said, and he writes these things now supposedly,
"there are several Verant people who have high level bards that he consults
regularly when bard issues come up."

Course, they probably "just play mana song" for the casters that hold the
real power.

Kit


LOL i didn't think of that, but funny =)

Shada

> Am I the only one that is upset that they can't even take 2
> seconds to hit
> Rokenn's Site and look up the name of the goddamned song?
>
> Draelon
